content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani

content: Hello Juan, it's nice to meet you. The rental price for the apartment is 450 euros per month. Would you be interested in renting it at this price?
name: Juan Mamani

content:
I was hoping you could be more open to negotiation. Is there room for a lower rental price?

Also, I was wondering if you could provide some details about the apartment. How many rooms does it have? What is the condition of the apartment? Is it furnished or unfurnished?

Thank you for your time.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Of course, I'm happy to negotiate. Based on your interests, I could consider a lower rental price. However, this would depend on the specific terms and conditions of the lease agreement.

Regarding the details of the apartment, it is a one-bedroom, one-bathroom unit with an open-concept living area. The condition of the apartment is good, with clean and well-maintained floors and walls. It is also furnished with a bed, dresser, and desk.

Please let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help with.
name: Juan Mamani

content:
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to know more about the terms of the lease agreement. Specifically, I was wondering if there was a security deposit required and if it was refundable at the end of the lease term?

Also, I would like to know if there are any penalties or fees for breaking the lease early.

Thank you for your time.

I agree to the price of 350 euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your response, Juan. The lease agreement does require a security deposit of one month's rent, which would be 350 euros. This deposit is refundable at the end of the lease term, provided that there are no damages to the apartment and all rent payments have been made on time.

There are no penalties or fees for breaking the lease early, but you would need to provide at least one month's notice before the end of the lease term.

I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 350 euros per month. Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there's anything else I can help with.
name: Juan Mamani
